ShadowQuest

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShadowQuest.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the camera that controls our viewpoint.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Position pos
      The camera's position in the world, in x and y coordinates.
      int screenheight
      Screen height, in pixels.
      int screenwidth
      Screen width, in pixels.
      private Player unitFollow
      The unit this camera is following

        public boolean onScreen(Position pos)
        Checks whether the given map position is currently being displayed by the camera, with some offset in pixels
        Parameters:
